definitions.definition: A large, powerful computer able to manage very many simultaneous tasks and communicate with very many connected terminals ; used by large, complex organizations (such as banks and supermarkets ) where continuously sustained operation is vital .
A computer chassis that hosts and interconnects modules that perform various tasks.
The main frame of a vehicle etc., more commonly main frame .

main_definition: ( computer hardware ) A large, powerful computer able to manage very many simultaneous tasks and communicate with very many connected terminals ; used by large, complex organizations (such as banks and supermarkets ) where continuously sustained operation is vital .
secondary_definitions: ( computer hardware ) A computer chassis that hosts and interconnects modules that perform various tasks.
The main frame of a vehicle etc., more commonly main frame .
